title: Elf Hime Nina
synopsis: Kyle, the protagonist of this story, is one of the 7 heroes who defeated the evil overlord. After that battle he starts a conquest of the continent in order to unite the humans who live on it.
staff: [['Koike, Ahiru', ['Director']], ['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Tominaga, Tsuneo', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Yakushi, Ruri', ['Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition']]]
